document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Seasons </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">since </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Dimpled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">War </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Conqueror </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">slain </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">Centuries </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">'twill </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Another </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Massacre </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">before </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">modest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">vain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Formula </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">fought </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Pink </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Redoubt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: 'Tis seasons since the dimpled war
